item.title: Berkshire Hathaway operating earnings dip 4% as conglomerate braces for tariff impact
item.description: Berkshire's operating profit dipped 4% year over year to $11.16 billion in the second quarter.

item.title: Robotaxis are becoming a reality. Who’s poised to win in China and beyond
item.description: Shanghai in late July became the latest region in China to allow fully autonomous taxis to charge fares in parts of the city.

item.title: ‘The eye of the hurricane’: Why the U.S. job market has soured, economists say
item.description: Federal data suggests the job market has slowed more than previously thought amid economic headwinds.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Apple, Amazon, Monolithic Power, Reddit and more
item.description: Here are some of the stocks posting the largest moves midday Friday.

item.title: BlackRock's Rick Rieder says a half-point rate cut by the Fed in September is possible
item.description: Rieder's comment came after data showed U.S. labor market suffered a sizable slowdown in the past few months.
